root.name: Elminage Gothic
root.description: OverviewElminage Gothic is a turn-based first-person six character party dungeon crawler RPG, developed by Starfish for the PSP. Part of the Elminage series of fantasy RPGs, this game changes the formula somewhat by including horror elements inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos. It was released on May 24th, 2012 in Japan, with a 3DS port to follow in 2013.
